input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Non-Iron Dress Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Meet your new wardrobe staple. This must have textured solid dress shirt is perfect for any occasion, keeping you looking your absolute best at work and on the weekends. Available in trim fit and standard fit. Need help finding your shirt size? Check out our Shirt Size Guide for the perfect fit.
Collar Style: Semi-spread. A popular collar style that has a wider spread between the collar points to accommodate the widest range of tie knots. Also the best collar type to dress down and wear without a tie.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Regular Fit Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Stretch Regent Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Explorer Collection Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Stretch Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Women's Classic-Fit Non-Iron Stretch Supima Cotton Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Oxford Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Women's Tailored Easy-Care Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Standard-Fit Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Signature Stretch Poplin Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Pinpoint Oxford Polo'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Relaxed Broken-In Organic Cotton Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim Secret Wash Cotton Poplin Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Slim Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Oxford Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Oxford Polo'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Women's Classic Fit Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Westminster Weave Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim Untucked Organic Cotton Poplin Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Slim Fit Wrinkle Resistant Button Down Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Secret Wash Cotton Poplin Shirt with Point Collar'
  - Name='J.Crew Women's Gar√ßon Classic Cotton Poplin Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Slim Dobby Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Kenneth Cole Men's Slim Fit Point Collar Dress Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Regular Fit Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a non-iron dress shirt similar in fabric type (Supima cotton), fit (regular/stretch), and purpose, making it highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar to the reference product in material, non-iron feature, and dress shirt classification.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Stretch Regent Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt focusing on stretch fit, similar purpose, though 'Regent' indicates a specific fit variation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Explorer Collection Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt from a specific collection; likely similar but collection branding may imply somewhat different style or target.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Stretch Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar non-iron dress shirt tailored for big & tall sizes, similar fabric and features but a different sizing focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Women's Classic-Fit Non-Iron Stretch Supima Cotton Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt with similar fabric but designed for women, so less relevant for a men's shirt reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Oxford Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Oxford fabric vs general poplin or broadcloth; still a non-iron dress shirt for men, slightly different fabric texture.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Women's Tailored Easy-Care Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Easy-care implies some similarity, but tailored fit and women's shirt reduce relevancy compared to men's dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Standard-Fit Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's shirt with Oxford fabric, likely dress shirt style, but no non-iron feature mentioned, reducing relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Signature Stretch Poplin Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's stretch poplin shirt, likely dress style, but non-iron feature not specified, so somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Pinpoint Oxford Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron but a polo shirt, which differs in silhouette and construction from dress shirts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Relaxed Broken-In Organic Cotton Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casual relaxed fit and 'broken-in' style differs from crisp non-iron dress shirt, reducing relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Slim Secret Wash Cotton Poplin Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit dress shirt in poplin, but no mention of non-iron treatment, somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Slim Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit non-iron dress shirt, very similar in features and function to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Oxford Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Oxford fabric dress shirt, but no info on non-iron feature or fit, so moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly similar to reference: non-iron, Supima cotton, stretch fit, just with big & tall sizing.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Oxford Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron polo shirt differs from dress shirt in collar style and usage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Women's Classic Fit Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fabric and features but designed for women, so moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Westminster Weave Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron men‚Äôs dress shirt with a specific weave; very similar product category, makes it highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Slim Untucked Organic Cotton Poplin Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Untucked style and organic cotton without non-iron features make it less aligned with the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Slim Fit Wrinkle Resistant Button Down Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wrinkle resistant feature is similar to non-iron, button down and slim fit are fairly close; somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Secret Wash Cotton Poplin Shirt with Point Collar
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Poplin shirt with point collar; no non-iron feature and the secret wash implies a different finish; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Women's Gar√ßon Classic Cotton Poplin Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's shirt, no mention of non-iron, less relevant due to gender and finish differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Slim Dobby Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit dress shirt with dobby weave, but no non-iron feature mentioned; relevant but less so than non-iron shirts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kenneth Cole Men's Slim Fit Point Collar Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit point collar dress shirt; assumed similar style but no non-iron designation reduces relevancy slightly.
